title.title: Hammersmith and City services restored from 2 August

texts: A full service will operate from August 2 on the Hammersmith & City line.
A full service will operate on the District line between Wimbledon and Edgware Road
This will be the first time since 7 July that services have operated on the whole line between Hammersmith and Barking.

A rail replacement bus service between Hammersmith and Edgware Road will be in place until the end of Monday 1 August.

A full service will also operate on theDistrict line between Wimbledon and Edgware Road, and on all parts of theDistrict line with all stations served.
Further information on when full services will resume on theCircle andPiccadilly lines will be available later this week.
TheCircle line has been suspended since 7 July 2005.

Work continues to restore services on theCircle line as quickly as possible but recommencing services along the entire length of theHammersmith & City line first delivers the biggest benefit to customers.
AllCircle line stations are served byDistrict, Hammersmith & City andMetropolitan line services.
It is anticipated thatCircle line services will be restored shortly.
ThePiccadilly line is currently not operating between Hyde Park Corner and Arnos Grove, and between Rayners Lane and Uxbridge.
Until further notice, a special bus service will call at Arnos Grove and Finchley Central to provide a connection with theNorthern line .
A second special bus service will operate from Arnos Grove, calling at Bounds Green, Wood Green, Turnpike Lane and Seven Sisters to connect withVictoria line services.
Additional bus services are operating on route 91 between Holloway Road and Euston via Caledonian Road and King's Cross St Pancras.

Live information on TfL's Realtime pages displays latest updates to London's transport modes, including the Tube, DLR, bus and Network Rail
http://www.tfl.gov.uk/realtime

Journey Planner checks the transport network's status before providing results. The best available route will be shown automatically
http://www.tfl.gov.uk/journeyplanner
Travel alerts via SMS and email can be set up at http://tfl.gov.uk/alerts
